content.prompt: The Hypostyle Hall at the Temple of Amun-Re at Karnak most likely includes columns resembling blossoming papyrus stalks within the enormous, dimly lit interior to evoke in visitors the impression of

choices.label: witnessing the creation of the world arising from the primordial sea
entering a sacred labyrinth filled with prophetic voices of plantlike deities
being transported into the dark underworld to be judged by Osiris
receiving a vision of the afterlife as a garden of paradise

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
